body_html:
@peterjc123
Great, thank you very much, I manage to install it on VS2017 C++ x86_64 cross command prompt.

However, I have the following error when testing on VS2017
command:
import torch
torch.Tensor([1,2,3],[4,5,6])

Is my build and install complete ?
Note: CPU version (No CUDA), python 3.6.1,Anaconda 4.4, CMAKE G= Visual Studio 15 2017 Win64

body:
@peterjc123 
Great, thank you very much, I manage to install it on VS2017 C++ x86_64 cross command prompt. 
![build](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30174905/31336641-56bcd6d2-ad2a-11e7-8b16-0b186663b740.PNG)

However, I have the following error when testing on VS2017
command:
import torch
torch.Tensor([1,2,3],[4,5,6])
![error](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30174905/31336700-94eb39a8-ad2a-11e7-8b9f-849545f8a89a.PNG)
Is my build and install complete ? 
Note: CPU version (No CUDA), python 3.6.1,Anaconda 4.4,  CMAKE G= Visual Studio 15 2017 Win64
